TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Spin/Down extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Spin::Down abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the downward-pointing arrow for a spin button control (also known as an up-down control). This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.Down> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the downward-pointing arrow for a spin button.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.Down.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Spin_Down1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#53)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#53)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a downward-pointing spin button arrow in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A that represents a downward-pointing spin button arrow in the disabled state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Spin.Down.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.

Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElement_Spin_Down4` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
